title: WNBA Honors Griner, Raiders' Historic Hire (Podcast)
itunes:title: WNBA Honors Griner, Raiders' Historic Hire (Podcast)
description:
Bloomberg's Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower talk the latest sports headlines, including how the WNBA honored Brittney Griner during their All-Star Game in Chicago, the Las Vegas Raiders hiring the first Black female team president in NFL history, and LIV Golf CEO Greg Norman not being invited to the British Open.

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
